mapper.insert: insert into zsd_order (id, user_id, title, img, address, price, phone, price_type, create_time, order_status, deposit, order_long, order_lat, ordertypeid, beiyong1, beiyong2, detail, order_text ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deposit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderLong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordertypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beiyong1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beiyong2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{orderText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

update zsd_order
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price_type = #{priceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deposit = #{deposit,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
order_long = #{orderLong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_lat = #{orderLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ordertypeid = #{ordertypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
beiyong1 = #{beiyong1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beiyong2 = #{beiyong2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
order_text = #{orderText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update zsd_order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price_type = #{priceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deposit = #{deposit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_long = #{orderLong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_lat = #{orderLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ordertypeid = #{ordertypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, beiyong1 = #{beiyong1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beiyong2 = #{beiyong2,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from zsd_order where order_lat > #{lat} - 1 and order_lat < #{lat} + 1 and order_long > #{lon} - 1 and order_long < #{lon} + 1 order by ACOS( SIN((#{lat} * 3.1415) / 180) * SIN((order_lat * 3.1415) / 180) + COS((#{lat} * 3.1415) / 180) * COS((order_lat * 3.1415) / 180) * COS( (#{lon} * 3.1415) / 180 - (order_long * 3.1415) / 180 ) ) * 6380 ASC
